entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.7°C

Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
